attributes.action: Feed in Tariff Rates for Solar Power for Homes
attributes.additional_details:
Current renewable energy via Solar Panels fitted on domestic houses Feed In Tariffs (FIT) are now said are going to be slashed by the 8th of December 2011. The original time scale for review was by the 31st of March 2012.
I believe that the date in 2012 should be adhered to.
